info.description: The Claim Service provides information about claims that are filed. Information includes info on the policy that each claim is tied to, incident and settlement dates, claim amounts, and the claim's status.
info.title: Claim Service Service API

post.description: Create the Claim specified within the body of this request. The created Claim will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: claim
parameters.description: A new Claim to be created

post.description: Create the Claim Party specified within the body of this request. The created Claim Party will be returned.

get.description: Retrieves all Claims for the context

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Value for sorting (not required), by defaults sorts by updated date

parameters.name: isDescending
parameters.description: Value which sets order for sorting, true by default

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Filter results by specified claim statuses.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Filter results by specified customer ID.

createdOn.description: The time stamp of when the Claim Party was created.

email.description: The email of the owner of the Claim Party.

firstName.description: The first name of the owner of the Claim Party.

id.description: The unique ID of the Claim Party.

lastName.description: The last name of the owner of the Claim Party.

updatedOn.description: The time stamp of when the Claim Party was last updated.

createdOn.description: The time stamp of when the Claim Payment was created.

id.description: The unique ID for the Claim Payment

lossCaseCode.description: The loss case code of Claim Payment.

updatedOn.description: The time stamp of when the Claim Payment was last updated.

ClaimPaymentV1.description: This model describes a Claim Payment. A Claim can have multiple payments.

claimDescription.description: The description of the incident of the Claim.

createdOn.description: The time stamp of when the Claim was created.

customerId.description: The ID of the Customer that is tied to the Claim.

damageDescription.description: The description of the damage of the incident.

dateClosed.description: The date that the Claim has been closed.

dateOfLoss.description: The datetime of the incident of the Claim.

dateOpened.description: The date that the Claim has been opened.

dateReported.description: The date that the Claim has been reported.

id.description: The unique ID of the Claim.

policyId.description: The ID of the Policy that is tied to the Claim.

updatedOn.description: The time stamp of when the Claim was last updated.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements
